ygData.subject: Re: Yes spell animations are lame and......more inside
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Cristie  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com  Date: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 2:48 PM Subject: [eq_wizards] Comment on
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Cristie <cristie@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 2:48 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Comment on Solric's comment...


I agree,the animations should be different for each spell(a cleric spell
shouldnt look the same as a wizard spell).
Another thing that has been bothering me is that the party members do not
see the damage that our spells do. I always see the damage amount that the
tanks are doing. It kinda torks me when I see "so and so backstabs a goblin
for 25 pts" After the fight the tanks are all patting each other on the back
saying things like "man gotta love that back stab damage hehe". Im sitting
there medding thinking "yeah well I just hit it 4 times for 38 damage
each"...Thing is all they know is "A goblins skin frezzes over" That dont
sound like a lot of damage to them... so...Oh well...Rant over!
Kueken 12 level mith marr
